column2: When you are within 1m of a trap or secret dor, you intuitively know of it's existence but not necessarily its sources, functionality, or intent.
column3: When you are within 2m of a trap or secret dor, you intuitively know of it's existence but not necessarily its sources, functionality, or intent.
column4: When you are in the same room as a trap or secret door, you intuitively know of it's existence as well as its source.
